languages.text: "Сила и вера не помогли им, когда за ними пришли. Надеюсь, они сделают выводы попрактичнее, чем больше молиться и бить поклоны. Хотя кого я обманываю?"
"Strength and faith didn't help them when push came to shove. I'd like to think they'll respond to this calamity by doing something other than praying and genuflecting, but who am I kidding?"
languages.original_text: "Сила и вера не помогли им, когда за ними пришли. Надеюсь, они сделают выводы попрактичнее, чем больше молиться и бить поклоны. Хотя кого я обманываю?"

traits.locale_text: "Strength and faith didn't help them when push came to shove. I'd like to think they'll respond to this calamity by doing something other than praying and genuflecting, but who am I kidding?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Strength and faith didn't help them when push came to shove. I'd like to think they'll respond to this calamity by doing something other than praying and genuflecting, but who am I kidding?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Strength and faith didn't help them when push came to shove. I'd like to think they'll respond to this calamity by doing something other than praying and genuflecting, but who am I kidding?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Strength and faith didn't help them when push came to shove. I'd like to think they'll respond to this calamity by doing something other than praying and genuflecting, but who am I kidding?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “在危急关头，坚强和信仰可帮不了他们。我猜到了那个时候，他们会采用跪地祈祷之外的方式来应对灾难。不过，我是不是揶揄到某人了？”
languages.original_text: "Strength and faith didn't help them when push came to shove. I'd like to think they'll respond to this calamity by doing something other than praying and genuflecting, but who am I kidding?"

traits.locale_text: “在危急关头，坚强和信仰可帮不了他们。我猜到了那个时候，他们会采用跪地祈祷之外的方式来应对灾难。不过，我是不是揶揄到某人了？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Leur force et leur foi ne leur ont été d'aucune utilité le moment venu. Ce serait bien qu'ils répondent à cette calamité avec autre chose que des prières et des génuflexions, mais bon, on peut toujours rêver. »
languages.original_text: "Strength and faith didn't help them when push came to shove. I'd like to think they'll respond to this calamity by doing something other than praying and genuflecting, but who am I kidding?"

traits.locale_text: « Leur force et leur foi ne leur ont été d'aucune utilité le moment venu. Ce serait bien qu'ils répondent à cette calamité avec autre chose que des prières et des génuflexions, mais bon, on peut toujours rêver. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Stärke und Glaube haben mir nicht geholfen, als es hart auf hart kam. Ich würde gerne hoffen, dass sie auf diese Katastrophe antworten, indem sie mehr tun als nur zu beten und auf die Knie zu fallen, doch wem mache ich etwas vor?"
languages.original_text: "Strength and faith didn't help them when push came to shove. I'd like to think they'll respond to this calamity by doing something other than praying and genuflecting, but who am I kidding?"

traits.locale_text: "Stärke und Glaube haben mir nicht geholfen, als es hart auf hart kam. Ich würde gerne hoffen, dass sie auf diese Katastrophe antworten, indem sie mehr tun als nur zu beten und auf die Knie zu fallen, doch wem mache ich etwas vor?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「強さも信念も、いざというときには役立たなかった。この災難に対して、彼らが祈りひざまずくこと以外に何かしてくれると思いたいわ、でしょ？」
languages.original_text: "Strength and faith didn't help them when push came to shove. I'd like to think they'll respond to this calamity by doing something other than praying and genuflecting, but who am I kidding?"

traits.locale_text: 「強さも信念も、いざというときには役立たなかった。この災難に対して、彼らが祈りひざまずくこと以外に何かしてくれると思いたいわ、でしょ？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «La fuerza y la fe no les han ayudado la primera vez. Espero que saquen mejores conclusiones que seguir rezando y arrodillándose, pero tampoco me hago ilusiones».
languages.original_text: "Strength and faith didn't help them when push came to shove. I'd like to think they'll respond to this calamity by doing something other than praying and genuflecting, but who am I kidding?"

traits.locale_text: «La fuerza y la fe no les han ayudado la primera vez. Espero que saquen mejores conclusiones que seguir rezando y arrodillándose, pero tampoco me hago ilusiones».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Strength and faith didn't help them when push came to shove. I'd like to think they'll respond to this calamity by doing something other than praying and genuflecting, but who am I kidding?"

languages.text: "Bıçak kemiğe dayandığında kudret ve inanç hiçbir işlerine yaramadı. Artık böyle bir felaketle karşılaştıklarında diz çöküp dua etmekle yetinmezler diye düşünmek isterdim de huylu huyundan vazgeçmiyor işte."
languages.original_text: "Strength and faith didn't help them when push came to shove. I'd like to think they'll respond to this calamity by doing something other than praying and genuflecting, but who am I kidding?"

traits.locale_text: "Bıçak kemiğe dayandığında kudret ve inanç hiçbir işlerine yaramadı. Bu felaket karşısında diz çöküp dua etmekle yetinmezler diye düşünmek isterdim ancak kendimi kandırmış olurum."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
